== Description ==

Determine whether Multisite support is enabled.

== Usage ==

%%% <?php if ( is_multisite() ) { echo 'Multisite is enabled'; } ?> %%%

== Parameters ==

This function does not accept any parameters.

== Returns ==
; (BOOLEAN) : True if Multisite is enabled, false otherwise

== Changelog ==

Since: [[Version 3.0|WordPress 3.0.0]]

== Source Code ==

<code>is_multisite()</code> is located in {{Trac|wp-includes/load.php}}.
